column1: ONE BIG FAT LIE AND A FEW TWISTED TRUTHS

column2: Cid’s dream wasn’t to become a protagonist or a final boss. He’d rather lie low as a minor character until it’s prime time to reveal he’s a mastermind…or at least
column3: do the next best thing-pretend to be one! And now that he’s been reborn into another world
column4: he’s ready to set the perfect conditions to live out his dreams to the fullest. Armed with his overactive imagination
column5: Cid jokingly recruits members to his organization and makes up a whole backstory about an evil cult that they need to take down. Well
column7: these imaginary adversaries turn out to be the real deal-and everyone knows the truth but him!
